scenario_text.value:
I don’t get you guys... How can you hang out
with these...THINGS like it’s nothing?!
I don’t have a good answer for that...

I wigged out the first time, but they’re good
guys. You just gotta get used to them.
Well, uh, if you say so, I can kinda...
AHHHH! Don’t just come at me like that!
What the hell, man? I just don’t get it...
